org.jcvi.jillion.assembly

Class AbstractAssemblyTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.AbstractAssemblyTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssemblyTransformer

    public abstract class AbstractAssemblyTransformer
extends Object
implements AssemblyTransformer
    AbstractAssemblyTransformer is an abstract class that implements all the methods of AssemblyTransformer but the methods are all no-ops. This way you only have to implement the methods you care about.
    Author:
    dkatzel

                                 NucleotideSequence gappedReference)
        Description copied from interface: AssemblyTransformer
        The reference or consensus sequence used in the assembly.
        Specified by:
        referenceOrConsensus in interface AssemblyTransformer
        Parameters:
        id - the reference or contig consensus id; can not be null.
        gappedReference - the gapped NucleotideSequence

        Description copied from interface: AssemblyTransformer
        The end of the assembly has been reached.

      • notAligned

        public void notAligned(String id,
                       NucleotideSequence nucleotideSequence,
                       QualitySequence qualitySequence,
                       PositionSequence positions,
                       URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: AssemblyTransformer
        This read did not align to any reference or contig consensus.
        Specified by:
        notAligned in interface AssemblyTransformer
        Parameters:
        id - the read id.
        nucleotideSequence - the NucleotideSequence; can not be null.
        qualitySequence - the QualitySequence for this read; may be null if not known.
        positions - the PositionSequence for this read; may be null if not known or if there are no positions (for example if this read is not sanger).
        uri - the URI for the location of the file that contains this read; may be null if not known.

      • aligned

        public void aligned(String readId,
                    NucleotideSequence nucleotideSequence,
                    QualitySequence qualitySequence,
                    PositionSequence positions,
                    URI sourceFileUri,
                    String referenceId,
                    long gappedStartOffset,
                    Direction direction,
                    NucleotideSequence gappedSequence,
                    ReadInfo readInfo)
        Description copied from interface: AssemblyTransformer
        This read aligned to a particular reference at the given location.
        Specified by:
        aligned in interface AssemblyTransformer
        Parameters:
        readId - the read id.
        nucleotideSequence - the NucleotideSequence; can not be null.
        qualitySequence - the QualitySequence for this read; may be null if not known.
        positions - the PositionSequence for this read; may be null if not known or if there are no positions (for example if this read is not sanger).
        sourceFileUri - the URI for the location of the file that contains this read; may be null if not known.
        referenceId - the reference id this read aligned to. This id must be mentioned previously by a call to AssemblyTransformer.referenceOrConsensus(String, NucleotideSequence).
        gappedStartOffset - the gapped start offset (0-based) of the read into the gapped reference or consensus sequence.
        direction - the read direction.
        gappedSequence - the gapped sequence of this read to align to the reference/consensus
        readInfo - the ReadInfo for this read.

      • assemblyCommand

        public void assemblyCommand(String name,
                            String version,
                            String parameters)
        Description copied from interface: AssemblyTransformer
        The command that was run to generate this assembly. This method will only be called if the command is known.
        Specified by:
        assemblyCommand in interface AssemblyTransformer
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the assembler used.
        version - the version of the assembler used.
        parameters - the parameters used in the assembly invocation.

        public void referenceFile(URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: AssemblyTransformer
        The URI of the reference file used in this assembly.
        Specified by:
        referenceFile in interface AssemblyTransformer
        Parameters:
        uri - the path to the reference file.

      • readFile

        public void readFile(URI uri)
        Description copied from interface: AssemblyTransformer
        The URI of a read file used in this assembly. If more than one read file was used, then this method may be called more than once.
        Specified by:
        readFile in interface AssemblyTransformer
        Parameters:
        uri - the path to the read file.
